name: purplish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
almost purple in colour: He has a purplish birthmark on his cheek. The fruit has a deep, purply skin with golden flesh.
More examplesFewer examplesThese onions have purplish red skins and white flesh.She had a purplish rash all over her legs.Suddenly the sky clouded over, purply and menacing.
